title: # 276 - Aisling Bea & ME
description:
I sit down with Irish comic Aisling Bea to talk about her transition from acting to comedy, winning "So you think you're funny", the comedy store, and UK vs USA comics. 

Aisling's Instagram is @weemissbea 

This episode is brought to you by Square Space. For a free trial go to www.squarespace.com and use the offer code “Bertcast” and save 10% on your first purchase of a website or domain. 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com  
To Follow me on..
